name: captions
title: Captions
summary: Learn how to upload a caption file and perform in-video searches

steps.title: Select a Media Entry
steps.description:
Choose a video from your library to add captions to. You can then use the page below to upload an SRT file to Kaltura. If you don't have an SRT file handy, you can [download a sample SRT file here](/sample_captions.srt)

JavaScript clients can make use of the [jQuery fileupload plugin](https://github.com/kaltura/jQuery-File-Upload). Others should utilize the ```uploadToken``` service.

steps.title: Attaching the Caption File
steps.description: Once you've uploaded the file, you'll need to attach it to the video using ```captionAsset.add``` and ```captionAsset.setContent```

steps.title: Searching through Captions
steps.description: You can use ```captionAssetItem.search``` to search for scenes within your videos.
